name: PolyArena
description:
PolyArena is a multiplayer game where you fight with your friends in an arena. Be the last one alive in the arena to win the game. It can be played by 2-6 players (Currently there are 2 different player classes; Warrior and Viking).

NOTE: This project is developed as an hobby and aim was to learn "multiplayer". Game contains no bots so it is not possible to play alone! 

Controls and hints can be found at help section in game.
